dialogue:
[header name:Impatient Kid]
Hey mister, I heard it's very dangerous out 
there, full of [color value:red][style value:shake]monsters[style value:none]![color value:regular]

[newpage wait:1.5]
[header name:Impatient Kid]
Are you bringing powerful 
[color value:blue]cards[color value:regular] 
with you?[endl][pause value:.5]
Our dad says I can't leave until 
I learn how to use cards...
name: Kid 1
